name: TZnake Eyes
description:
In this game, you play as the little witch Pia-Pia. Use her wand to cast spells at the evil snakes. Collect 20 golden dice to win. Good luck!

How to play:

  1. Download the zip file provided below.
  2. Unzip the zip file.
  3. Run the "TZnake-Eyes.exe" file.

This game was created by me for the 2022 GMTK Game Jam. I designed, programmed and drew the game using Game Maker.

I used the following sound effects (thanks to their respective creators!):

  • https://pixabay.com/sound-effects/fire-magic-6947/
  • https://pixabay.com/sound-effects/015965-city-night-56166/
  • https://pixabay.com/sound-effects/dice-sound-40081/
  • https://pixabay.com/sound-effects/short-success-sound-glockenspiel-treasure-video-game-6346/
  • https://pixabay.com/sound-effects/woman-clearing-throat-fx-39169/
  • https://pixabay.com/sound-effects/pistol-cock-6014/
  • https://pixabay.com/sound-effects/sniper-rifle-firing-shot-1-39789/
